title: Fallout 5 & Starfield: Todd Howard Gives New Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.15.22
description:
Blessing and Janet talk about a new Todd Howard interview detailing Starfield, Fallout, and Elder Scrolls VI plans, Neon White and TMNT Shredder's Revenge reviews, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:19 - Housekeeping

A new episode of the Gamescast is now live wrapping up our time at Summer Game Fest Play Days playing Sonic Frontiers, Cuphead DLC, and more. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

That Xbox & Bethesda EXTENDED showcase is going down, and if you’re wondering where our impressions of that are, HAVE NO FEAR. Kinda Funny Xcast will be breaking that down in their episode this week. Look out for that in the regular locations.

The Kinda Funny Tik Tok has a TON of previews from Summer Game Fest including Street Fighter 6, Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course , and Wrestlequest! @kindafunnygames on Tik Tok!

Remember, we’ve got a Quarry Spoilercast up right now on the Gamescast feed where we go through our different decisions to see how are various stories played out. That’s me, Greg, Mike, and Joey. That’s up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:07:34 - Todd Howard said the words “Fallout 5”
00:22:15 - TMNT Shredder's Revenge Review Round Up
00:30:24 - Neon White Review Round Up
00:41:54 - Ad
00:44:10 - STALKER 2 now coming in 2023, please watch their update video: https://youtu.be/RxcfxdG22pg
00:47:54 - We got new Gran Turismo movie details
00:57:51 - Lollipop Chainsaw Seems to Be Making a Return
01:00:21 - Out today
01:02:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Russ Frushtick
